summary: Successfully tested BLOCK 51 Fractal Dashboard with institutional white design. All main components working properly including SignalCard, ReliabilityPanel, HorizonTable, ForecastChart (Canvas with Catmull-Rom spline), MatchesList, and ExplainBlock with noTradeReasons.

flaky_endpoints.symptoms: WebSocket connections to /ws failing with 404 or connection errors
flaky_endpoints.workaround: Does not affect main functionality, page works without WebSocket

passed_tests: Fractal page loads with white institutional design
SignalCard displays action (HOLD), confidence (1.2%), expected return (+10.7%), dominant horizon (30d)
ReliabilityPanel shows reliability badge (OK), score (75.0%), tail risk (49.7%), entropy (98.3%), size multiplier (0.15x)
HorizonTable displays 3 rows (7d/14d/30d) with action, confidence, expected return, effective N
Horizon row selection works - clicking rows changes selected horizon
ForecastChart renders Canvas with Catmull-Rom spline and confidence band (1034x256)
MatchesList shows 3 matches with similarity percentages
All tabs (Dashboard, Signal, Matches, Backtest) are clickable and navigate properly
URL changes correctly on tab navigation
All components remain visible after tab navigation
success_percentage: frontend: 95% (WebSocket connection issues don't affect core functionality)
